name: Behind Closed Doors
overview: A totally light-hearted romp, featuring the mighty BALROG, who is trapped in the 'smallest' room. Together you must find a way of escape and perhaps wreak revenge upon those responsible for this dastardly act. All you and the BALROG have at your disposal are a copy of the 'Goblin Gazzette', the stub of a pencil and your wits .... will it be enough or will the poor BALROG be destined to spend the rest of his days with nothing but cold porcelain for comfort? It might not be easy but it will sure be fun!!
